_xResult.title: Epitome Winter Dress
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made cashmere dress with long-sleeves
_xResult.longdesc:
The best thing to gift yourself with this winter season is this made to measure cashmere dress. A dress…in cashmere…we cannot stop thinking about how luxurious this will feel on the skin! If you’re not looking forward to braving the cold, this custom made midi with long-sleeves and a ballooning silhouette will be sure to give you the extra push you need to make it out of the door.

 

Have fun with EUG's custom made designer clothing! For custom made requests regarding sizing, let the designer know using the button below.
